com.nfcalarmclock

Class NacDialog

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nfcalarmclock.util.dialog.NacDialog
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.DialogInterface.OnCancelListener, android.content.DialogInterface.OnClickListener, android.view.View.OnClickListener, android.view.View.OnLayoutChangeListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    NacAudioSourceDialog, NacColorPickerDialog, NacDayOfWeekDialog, NacNameDialog, NacRateMyAppDialog, NacScanNfcTagDialog, NacSpinnerDialog

    public class NacDialog
extends java.lang.Object
implements android.view.View.OnClickListener, android.view.View.OnLayoutChangeListener, android.content.DialogInterface.OnClickListener, android.content.DialogInterface.OnCancelListener
    A generic dialog object.

      • scale

        public void scale(double width,
                  double height,
                  boolean wrapWidth,
                  boolean wrapHeight)
        Scale the dialog size.
        Parameters:
        width - Width. Value must be 0 <= w <= 1.
        height - Height. Value must be 0 <= h <= 1.
        wrapWidth - Wrap the width in the event that the dialog is scaled too big.
        wrapHeight - Wrap the height in the event that the dialog is scaled too big.
